dmca.title: Guardian Media standing sentry against copying
dmca.body:
Comments:

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text and the photographs that appear on http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/weddings.htm and the photographs that appear on http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/Galleries/Tina_Luke/index.htm.

2.	The following material is infringing on the copyright:
Search query: "we add some ambience, a sound track of your choice"
Infringing webpages: http://www.gaspstudio.com/pricing.html http://www.vtvmedia.corn/Weddings.html http://users.bigpond.net.au/tagines/doc/photography.htm http://www.magichourpro.corn/mhp_weddings.html httpilwww.zoli.com/video/wedding.html
http://www.loslatinos.co.za/index_services_Vid_DVD.html http://memorylanenc.com
http://j-videos.co.uk/index.php?option=content&task=view&id=12

3.	My name is [private],
My email is [private]@guardianmedia.net.au My address is: [private],
ETTALONG BEACH,
NSW AUSTRALIA 2257
 
4.	The contact information for the offending websites is as follows:
www.gaspstudio.com	[private]@gaspstudio.com
www.vtvmedia.com	[private]@vtvmedia.com
users.bigpond.net.au/tagines	unknown
www.magichourpro.com	[private]@magichourpro.com
www.zoli.com	[private]@zoli.com
wwwloslatinos.co.za	unknown
j-videos.co.uk	[private]@j-videos.co.uk

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is a curate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the caner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Signed:

[private]
